name: Twist, Twist, Turn!
description:
Uh oh, stuck in a tight spot? Precision is key in this exciting remaster of the first level from Kuru Kuru Kururin from Gamefroot! Can you carefully navigate the spinning blade faithfully to the end, safe sand sound? How fast you can YOU complete the level?

This is just one of the dizzying array of games you can make in Gamefroot, click here to experiment making your own!
